titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z245: Ketubah, 1812

notesStmt.note: The upper register contains two frames and in them is a superscription, written in Oriental square script and beginning with b'shem rachman... The lower register contains the text of the ketubbah, written in cursive. The decorative border contains blue, pink and yellow flowers and foliage, and at the top of the page, a crown. Ketubbah is damaged and part of text is missing.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE)
